updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Added Set Boosters, with The List and Art Cards.
Snow lands no longer appear in common slots, just in the land slot (thanks LÃ©onard!).
Rare snow land Faceless Haven will no longer appear in Snow Land slot, only Rare slot.
Fixed some card rarities and land issues.
